content.description: Source: Stockholm International Peace Research Institute (SIPRI)
content.question:
<!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}-->

Respond to all parts of the question:

(a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for Iran between 1999 and 2018. Explain a possible reason for this trend in Iran.

(b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion between regime type and military spending in Iran.

(c) Explain why military spending in Iran differs from military spending in Mexico.

frqParts.text:
<!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}-->

Respond to all parts of the question:

(a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for Iran between 1999 and 2018. Explain a possible reason for this trend in Iran.

(b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion between regime type and military spending in Iran.

(c) Explain why military spending in Iran differs from military spending in Mexico.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
